QuestData.Title: Conservation of Magic
QuestData.Description: I have an idea. This construct will be of use to us. We simply need to jolt it awake.$b$bWe once stored great quantities of energy in conduits throughout the Conservatory. They are still functional, but only just.$b$bTake this.$b$b<Y'mera hands you a brightly glowing crystal.>$b$bIt will provide a small burst of magic that should help stabilize an erratic conduit. I think I have enough stored for eight or so.$b$bStabilizing a few should allow us to access the whole network.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did it work? I am curious if that crystal holds enough power to accomplish our goals.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes, excellent. The conduits are back online.$b$bThe construct however is proving a little more difficult to awaken than I had hoped.
